proposal: Diving into the ocean of the market, it's impressive how you've united the plankton to swim alongside the whales, proving every voice matters. With 157 holders in the ETH network, you're truly making waves. Imagine amplifying this unity with tools like DEX for seamless trades or a Lottery where every plankton can thrive, all while keeping your ecosystem thriving. Together, let's create a sea where everyone has the power to shape the currents.
